name: Bullet Control (Cpt.Furball, Berry Berry Niceu)
description:
They shouldn't have touched the artifact. Now their greed has cursed them to roam the endless desert.  

But Lady Luck has granted me with this magical weapon to purge this corruption.

And it shall be done.

As this is a 3D game, please enable "Hardware Acceleration" for your browser to have a smooth experience. Not sure how to do? Refer the links below:

Chrome: https://www.lifewire.com/hardware-acceleration-in-chrome-4125122

Mozilla: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/upgrade-graphics-drivers-use-hardware-accel...

If web version does not work out for you, we do have Linux and Windows version which performs better.

Keybinds Action Keyboard/Mouse Gamepad Shoot / Destroy bullet  Left click Right Trigger Look / Steer bullet Mouse Right Analog Stick Menu Escape Start Menu Navigation Up / down / left / right D-pad

Tips:

  • Every bullet you shoot will put you into bullet time.
  • Pressing Left click or Right Trigger during bullet time will destroy the bullet.
  • Bullets are rare, use them wisely.
  • One touch from the undead will kill you instantly.
Steer your bullet and kill as many undeads as you can! Collect "Clocks" to extend your bullet time Collect "Ammo Boxes" to get more bullets Blow Up Zombies! Developers
